PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2021-07102021-07-01
ActCanada Pension Plan Investment Board Act
PrecisReappointment of CHARLES MAGRO of Heritage Pointe, Alberta, as a director of the Board of Directors of the Canada Pension Plan Investment Board, to hold office during good behaviour for a term of three years, effective July 1, 2021.
AttachmentsAttachment
